# Sample Project

A sample multi-language project used as a test fixture for ns integration tests.

## Structure

- `src/event_store.rs` - Event storage in Rust
- `src/validator.rs` - Input validation in Rust
- `src/models.py` - Data models in Python
- `src/handlers.ts` - API handlers in TypeScript
- `src/server.go` - HTTP server in Go
- `src/utils.js` - Utility functions in JavaScript
